actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the maximum annual income limitations applicable to veterans' and widows' pensions.

summary.text: Increases the maximum annual income limitations applicable to veterans' and widows' pensions for those veterans of the Mexican border period, World War I, World War II, the Korean Conflict, or the Vietnam era. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521,541)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the maximum annual income limitations applicable to veterans' and widows' pensions.
